thread.title: MR G DAVIES
thread.title_full: The Shower Doctor Ltd reviewed by MR G DAVIES

author: MR G DAVIES
title: MR G DAVIES
text:
Contacted and ordered spares for 6 years old Triton and the parts were there the next day. When I discovered other issues on the installation of the parts, the ShowerDoctor team helped to sort out a solution immediately.
Very impressive service all round. Cheers guys.
